title: Start
body:
Hey there, my friend. I'm Joe and I am going to be your assistant today.
Do you feel hungry? So, let's go on an adventure.
First of all, you need to get a [b]spear[/b]. Let's go to the local craftsman and get one!
[[ -Let's go. |letsGo]]
[[ -Where can I find him? |letsGo]]

title: letsGo
body: To get to the craftsman you need to go down ‚¨áÔ∏è by the trail and then turn left ‚¨ÖÔ∏è, once you pass the bridge üåâ ,take the next down ‚¨áÔ∏è, than left ‚¨ÖÔ∏è and then up ‚¨ÜÔ∏è.

title: CraftsmanItt
body:
Hello, what do you need? 
[[ -Are you the craftsman? |RuDCraftsman]] 
[[ -Nothing, just looking around |NothingCraft]]

title: RuDCraftsman
body:
Yes, how can I help you?
[[ -I need something to be made |optionsCraftsmanPolite]]
[[ -I want to get something |optionsCraftsmanRude]]

title: rightAnswer
body:
Sure, if you want it to be made first I will need a large stick and a stone.
When you find all the necessary materials, come back here.   
[[ -Where can i find the stick? |stick]]
[[ -Where can i find the stone? |stone]]

title: wrongAnswer
body:
I don't understand what are you trying to say.
[[ -Try again |optionsCraftsman]]
[[ -Maybe next time |NothingCraft]]

title: stick
body:
You can find the stick in the trees nearby.
[[ -And what about the stone?|stone]]
[[ -Okay, thank you |bye]]

title: stone
body:
If you want to get stone, you have to speak to the farmer.
To go to him just go up ‚¨ÜÔ∏è.
You just have to say the secret code [b]" [color=#ff0000]red[/color] apple " üçé.[/b]
[[ -And what about the stick?|stick]]
[[ -Okay, thank you |bye]]

title: farmerItt
body:
Hey, how can I help you today?
[[ -The craftsman sent me to get a stone. |askForCodePolite]]
[[ -I need you to give me a stone. |askForCodeRude]]
[[ -Nothing |Nothing]]

title: Nothing
body: Okay, see you.

title: correctCode
body: Good job, I will give you the stone now.

title: wrongCode
body:
Sorry, that is not the correct code.üòû
[[ -Try again |askForCode]]
[[ -Maybe next time |Nothing]]

title: SecondCraftsmanItt
body:
Great, I see you got all the necessary materials. Now I can craft a [b]spear[/b].
[[ -Thank you so much, can I ask you for another favor? |favorPolite]]
[[ -Can you teach me how to hunt |negativeAnswerRude]]

title: favorPolite
body:
Sure, anything.
[[ -Can you teach me how to hunt? |negativeAnswer]]
[[ -Can you help me build a house?  |buildAhouse]]

title: hunt
body:
Do you want me to tell you where to find her?
[[ -Sure. |toTheHunter]]
[[ -Yes, I would like to know. |toTheHunter]]

title: toTheHunter
body:
Her name is Amy and she lives in the forest, but the way to her is a bit complicated. 
Firstly you need to go back across the bridge and go down ‚¨áÔ∏è, then right ‚û°Ô∏è and you will go straight to the forest.
Luckily from there, there are [color=#0000ff]blue[/color] flowers which are leading to her tent.
[[ -Thank you, have a  nice day |thanking]]
[[ -Okay, bye|thanking]]

title: thanking
body: Have a nice day!

title: Hunter
body:
Hi, I am Amy, how can I help you?
[[ -The craftsman told me that you can teach me how to hunt. |huntingStartPolite]] 
[[ -I need some food, teach me how to hunt. |huntingStartRude]]
[[ -Never mind I don't need any help.|NothingForest]]

title: howToFindAnimal
body:
Usually deers ü¶å are in places where there are mushrooms üçÑ.
You just have to get close to it and hunt it.
When you do that come back to me and I will also teach you how to cook the meat.
[[ -Thank you for your help. |thankingAmy]]
[[ -Thanks |thankingAmy]]

title: BackToAmy
body:
Did you do everything I told you?
[[ -Yes, I got the meat. |cooking]] 
[[ -Yes, I have. |cooking]]

title: cooking
body:
Great, let's get to the cooking!
Go to the campfire and put the meat üçñ there.

title: thankingAmy
body: No problem, you are welcome!

title: NothingCraft
body: OK, bye!

title: start1
body:
Good morning buddy, I have some bad news for you. The merchant is ill and you need to save him. Your task is to go to the alchemist and get some medicine and deliver it to the merchant.
To get to her go down ‚¨áÔ∏è, left ‚¨ÖÔ∏è, across the bridge üåâ, straight ‚¨ÖÔ∏è and just follow the path to her she lives near two tents ‚õ∫ and there are also some camels üê´ there.

title: alchemistIll
body:
Hello, how can I help you? 
[[ -Give me your medicine! |medicineRude]]
[[ -My friend is ill, I need some medicine quickly. |medicinePolite]]

title: medicineRude
body:
Okay, but that is going to cost you 5 coins.
[[ -I have no coins. |noCoins]]
[[ -Why does it cost so much, can't I get it for free? |asksForFree]]

title: medicinePolite
body:
Okay, but that is going to cost you 5 coins.

title: asksForFree
